name: Flambae
notes: Flight. Great for combat right away. An ability that improves his stats when he succeeds.

name: Coup√©
notes: Flight. High movement. An ability to reattempt failed calls.

name: Punch Up
notes: He can't be downed. He's better when injured.

name: Prism
notes: Good charisma right away. She can duplicate other characters.

name: Invisigal
notes: Well-rounded right away. She's great for solo missions.

name: Sonar
notes: Two forms, making him essentially two different characters (though you can't control the change). Flight (on occasion). He can reattempt failed calls.

name: Malevola
notes: Great all-rounder. She can heal others.

name: Golem
notes: Easy to turn into an all-rounder. Great for solo missions.

name: Phenomaman
notes: Flight and low rest time. Best starting stats. Fun gambling mechanic to spice things up.

name: Waterboy
notes: Easy to turn into whatever your team is lacking. He can heal others. Great as a secondary or tertiary character to improve the chances of success on tough calls.
